definitions.definition: An underwater bank seen as a danger to shipping .
Rocks or other materials used to shore up an embankment , deter or prevent erosion, guide shipping, or serve as a temporary mooring .

main_definition: An underwater bank seen as a danger to shipping .
secondary_definitions: ( chiefly Canada , US ) Rocks or other materials used to shore up an embankment , deter or prevent erosion, guide shipping, or serve as a temporary mooring .
